children.description: Anything that can be rendered in the Wizard body (Type: any)

hasNoBodyPadding.description: Set to true to remove the default body padding

isDrawerExpanded.description: Flag indicating the wizard drawer is expanded

mainComponent.description: Component used as the primary content container (Type: React.ElementType)

onExpandDrawer.description: Callback function for when the drawer is toggled (Function: () => void)

Unknown.description:
Adds an accessible name to the wizard body by passing the the id of one or more elements.
The aria-labelledby will only be applied when the body content overflows and renders a scrollbar.
